data.title: bd-1bs: Auto-search workspaces when review/thread not found
data.description: When a review or thread ID is not found locally, search all jj workspaces before reporting 'not found'. Centralizes error helpers in helpers.rs with workspace-aware search. Eliminates the most common agent error pattern: forgetting --path for workspace reviews.

data.reason: Security review: LGTM. Parameterized SQL queries, proper Command::new (no shell injection), workspace paths from internal jj data (no user-controlled traversal), errors properly contained. Clean refactoring with no security concerns.
